task.name: sdlist
task.shortdescription: list summary of single dish data
task.description: Task sdlist lists the scan summary of the dataset after importing as a scantable into ASAP. It will optionally output this summary as file.

param.name: antenna
param.description: select an antenna name or ID, e.g. \'PM03\' (only effective for MS input)

param.name: outfile
param.description: name of output file (ASCII) for summary list

param.name: overwrite
param.description: overwrite the output file if already exists [True, False]

task.example:
------------------ Keyword arguments ------------------ infile -- name of input SD dataset default: none - must input file name example: 'mysd.asap' See sdcal for allowed formats. antenna -- select an antenna name or id (only effective for MS input) default: 0 example: 'PM03' NOTE this parameter is effective only for MS input outfile -- name of output file for summary list default: '' (no output file) example: 'mysd_summary.txt' overwrite -- overwrite the output file if already exists options: (bool) True,False default: False
----------- DESCRIPTION ----------- Task sdlist lists the scan summary of the dataset after importing as a scantable into ASAP. It will optionally output this summary as file.
------- WARNING ------- For the GBT raw SDFITS format data as input: SDtasks are able to handle GBT raw SDFITS format data since the data filler is available. However, the functionality is not well tested yet, so that there may be unknown bugs.
